content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you will find the apartment to your liking. So, what price were you considering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I was thinking about 500 Euro per month. It's a fair price for such a newly built and well-located apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 500 Euro per month is much lower than I was expecting. The location of the apartment and its modern amenities justify a higher rent. How about 750 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a little too high for me. Considering the apartment is unfurnished and has a modest size, I think 600 Euro would be more reasonable.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 600 Euro per month is still below my expectations. The demand for apartments in the city center is high, and I believe the quality of this apartment deserves a higher rent. Let's say 700 Euro per month, and I'll throw in a free month if you sign a one-year lease. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds like a good deal. I agree to the price of 700 Euro per month!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm glad to hear that! We have a deal at 700 Euro per month. Thank you for choosing my apartment. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your cooperation. I hope we will have a good landlord-tenant relationship. If there is no other issue, we can terminate the negotiation.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
